description:
Securely and rapidly exchange data on all major platforms.


Compatibility & Installation
1. Starting from this version, installation and updates are no longer supported on Windows 7 and Ubuntu 14.04, 16.04, and 18.04.
Fixed Issue
1. Fixed an issue where uploading files larger than 4 GB might fail on 32-bit Windows systems.
2. Fixed an issue where downloading files to an SMB shared folder might fail.
